evidence.text: Person B: Then they’d better be quick. Is this really necessary, Willi?
Person B: Let’s hope none of our brothers suffer from claustrophobia. Who knows how long we’ll have to be in here.
Person A: One hundred and three, Eminence.
Person B: I wonder where Tedesco has got to.

Person A: His name is Vincent Benitez, Eminence. He’s the Archbishop of Kabul.
Person B: Archbishop of where?
Person A: Kabul. He’s Mexican. The Holy Father appointed him last year.
Person B: Last year? And how has this been kept a secret?
Person A: I thought, perhaps, you would be aware of his elevation.
Person B: No. I am not.
Person A: He has a letter of appointment from the Pope addressed to the archdiocese of Kabul, which they kept secret at the Hol y Father’s request. You don’t think he could have forged it?
